code: import{useParams,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{useEffect}from"react";import Bank from"../BDD/bank.json";import Header from"../components/Header";import Footer from"../components/Footer";import TitleLogement from"../components/TitleLogement";import Slideshow from"../components/Slideshow";import Host from"../components/Host";import Collapse from"../components/Collapse";import"../style/FicheLogement.css";import"../style/Collapse.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function FicheLogement(){var _useParams=useParams(),id=_useParams.id;var card=Bank.find(function(item){return item.id===id;});var navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(function(){if(!card){navigate("/404");}},[card,navigate,id]);if(card){var Title="Description";var Text=card.description;var Title2="Equipement";var Text2=card.equipments.map(function(element,ind){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"ListEquipements",children:element},ind);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{accLink:"show",aProposLink:"show"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Slideshow,{img:card.pictures}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"LogementInfos",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TitleLogement,{title:card.title,tags:card.tags,location:card.location}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Host,{name:card.host.name,picture:card.host.picture,rating:card.rating})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"CollapseRow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{Title:Title,Text:Text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Collapse,{Title:Title2,Text:Text2})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}}export default FicheLogement;
